name: Synxdown
description: Synxdown is a lightweight no-dependency npm package for HTML and Markdown syntax highlighting.

name: Waveroom
description: Waveroom is a platform for creating and sharing your music takes and playlists.

name: SpotAlb
description: SpotAlb is a web project that leverages the Spotify Web API to fetch and present a visually appealing list of albums by a specified artist.

name: Denki
description: Denki is an AI-powered chatbot that can help you students with physics based probems.
